meanings.definition: To make a choice or come to a conclusion
meanings.sent1: She was deciding between two ice cream flavors.
meanings.sent2: I am deciding whether to go for a walk or stay home.
meanings.sent3: The cat was deciding if it should chase the laser pointer or take a nap.
meanings.sent4: The sun deciding to hide behind the clouds made the day feel gloomy.
meanings.sent5: The student spent hours deciding on the perfect topic for the essay.

meanings.definition: Serving as the final factor in making a decision
meanings.sent1: The weather was the deciding factor in canceling the picnic.
meanings.sent2: His deciding vote determined the outcome of the election.
meanings.sent3: The deciding cookie in the jar was the last one left.
meanings.sent4: The deciding goal in the game secured their victory.
meanings.sent5: The deciding moment came when she found the lost key.
